description: A dangerous smuggler helps an attractive woman and her 5-year-old daughter, while a police chief pursues a mad bomber in Los Angeles.
keywords: tape over mouth,father son relationship,hugging,hospital gown,handcuffs
name: Border Blues

review.name: I don't recommend to read the reviews
review.reviewBody:
Recently I understood that the majority count nothing. So what the majority of the reviewers think is just garbage. What do you want? An Oscar? This movie was pretty good, the acting was more than acceptable and very good for some characters, the plot was acceptable and I enjoyed this movie and I'm happy that I didn't listen to the reviewers. If I did that I would miss a movie that, in the end, I really liked.

Interesting that some characters spoke in Russian and others in Spanish, I mean they spoke in their mother languages and I liked that too.

There are a lot of movies out there and so bad that I can't believe that someone would be able to watch them and many times they got a better score than this... that means that unfortunately the honesty has gone and someone is paid to write good and bad reviews.

Very sad, many people don't have any more a conscience, they just think of money, that time has gone forever, it's time to be better people, not worse.

Give a try to this movie, maybe you'll like it.
